sections.name: Overview
sections.contents: Seraph2D is an educational game-based simulator that offers students an adaptive course in the principles of Quantum Cryptography.

sections.name: Responsibilities
sections.contents: As the primary developer for QuaSim, I was responsible for the design and implementation of the game architecture of our lesson system and their integration with Unreal Engine 4. I was also responsible for the implementation of any lesson-specific requirements.
